result.title: Bignum Contest
result.content:
Hi again!

Recently I learned how to use Polygon platform for making contests and I decided to make my first contest about Bignum :).

I know you have solved these problems a lot of times but this is my first contest and I just wanted to know how to use Polygon so Please Participants in it :)

I'm the only problem setter for this Contest but ._. will help me in future contests.

Wish you luck.

UPD1: The contest is unrated :P.

UPD2: I may add a problem during the contest but now it has 3 problems.
